## Bio

Cameron Jester is a junior Data Science and Analytics student at Simmons University with a minors in Economics and Software Engineering. She is from New Hampshire, and currently resides in Boston, Massachusetts. In school, she enjoys creating informative visuals using RStudio, learning and applying statistical methods to real-world data, and discussing economic theories. Outside of school, Cameron is passionate about exploring the outdoors, watching sports, and perfecting the art of making coffee.
